CustomField.description: Specifies the final action the MF Program Admin is to take to complete the MF administrative process, to specify the subject line of the Task to be generated.
CustomField.formula: IF( To_be_married_outside_of_local_diocese__c = TRUE, "Send MF Report and Certificate to " & TEXT(Signing_Priest_Deacon__r.Salutation) & " " & Signing_Priest_Deacon__r.FirstName & " " & Signing_Priest_Deacon__r.LastName, "Send MF Report to " & TEXT(Signing_Priest_Deacon__r.Salutation) & " " & Signing_Priest_Deacon__r.FirstName & " " & Signing_Priest_Deacon__r.LastName )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the final action the MF Program Admin is to take to complete the MF administrative process, to specify the subject line of the Task to be generated.
CustomField.label: Final Completion Task
